mapper.update: INSERT INTO WTM_TAA_CODE (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, TAA_CD, TAA_NM, TAA_TYPE_CD, HOL_INCL_YN, REQUEST_TYPE_CD, WORK_YN, WORK_APPR_HOUR, NOTE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{enterCd} , #{taaCd} , #{taaNm} , #{taaTypeCd} , #{holInclYn} , #{requestTypeCd} , #{workYn} ), #{workApprHour} , #{note} , #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TAA_NM = VALUES(TAA_NM), TAA_TYPE_CD = VALUES(TAA_TYPE_CD), HOL_INCL_YN = VALUES(HOL_INCL_YN), REQUEST_TYPE_CD = VALUES(REQUEST_TYPE_CD), WORK_YN = VALUES(WORK_YN), WORK_APPR_HOUR = VALUES(WORK_APPR_HOUR), NOTE = VALUES(NOTE), UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATE_ID = VALUES(UPDATE_ID)
